dataset.summary: The second ROSAT all-sky survey (2RXS) catalogue
dataset.remarks: The 2RXS catalogue is the second publicly released ROSAT catalogue of point-like sources obtained from the ROSAT all-sky survey observations performed between June 1990 and August 1991, and is an extended and revised version of the 1RXS catalogue. The 2RXS catalogue contains about 135,000 X-ray detections down to a detection likelihood of 6.5 in the 0.1-2.4 keV energy band. The 2RXS catalogue provides the deepest and cleanest X-ray all-sky survey catalogue before eROSITA data will become available.

column.name: [IAU_NAME]
column.summary: IAU name. Each source has been attributed an IAU name according to the IAU conventions. As this is the second ROSAT of point sources the prefix 2RXS is given in addition to the coordinate naming convention.

column.name: [IND_DET]
column.summary: Source number in a certain sky field

column.name: [EXT]
column.summary: Source extent in units of image pixels

column.name: [HR_1]
column.summary: Hardness ratio 1 value. Hardness ratio 1 values as calculated from the source counts in the energy channels A (11-41), B by: HR_1=(B-A)/(B+A) Hardness ratio 2 values as calculated from the source counts in the energy channels C (52-90), D(91-201) by: HR_2=(D-C)/(D+C)

column.name: [HR_2]
column.summary: Hardness ratio 2 value. Hardness ratio 1 values as calculated from the source counts in the energy channels A (11-41), B by: HR_1=(B-A)/(B+A) Hardness ratio 2 values as calculated from the source counts in the energy channels C (52-90), D(91-201) by: HR_2=(D-C)/(D+C)

column.name: [USKY]
column.summary: Unique flag. Sub-field detection cell defined in sky coordinates.

column.name: [CTS_lc]
column.summary: Number of counts calculated from the light curve analysis

column.name: [CHI2_lc]
column.summary: Chi2 value from the LC analysis

column.name: [Sigma_Excess]
column.summary: Excess variance in units of sigma

column.name: [NH_fit_p]
column.summary: neutral hydrogen density of PL fits

column.name: [CTR_spec_p]
column.summary: Count rate obtained from the PL fit

column.name: [Chi2red_spec_p]
column.summary: Reduced chi^2 value for the PL-fits

column.name: [Num_Data_pts_p]
column.summary: Number of data points for the PL-fits

column.name: [CTR_spec_m]
column.summary: Count rate obtained for the mekal fits

column.name: [Chi2red_spec_m]
column.summary: Reduced chi^2 value for mekal fits

column.name: [Chi2_spec_m]
column.summary: Chi^2 value for the mekal fits

column.name: [NORM_b]
column.summary: Normalization for the black body fits

column.name: [Temp_fit_b]
column.summary: Temperature of the black body fits

column.name: [CTR_spec_b]
column.summary: Count rate for the black body fit

column.name: [Chi2_spec_b]
column.summary: Chi2 value for the black body fits

column.name: [X_IMA]
column.summary: X image coordinate (45 arcsec) in image pixel

column.name: [Y_IMA]
column.summary: Y image coordinate (45 arcsec) in image pixel

column.name: [XERR]
column.summary: One-sigma error of X_IMA in image pixel

column.name: [YERR]
column.summary: One-sigma error of Y_IMA in image pixel

column.name: [X_SKY]
column.summary: X sky coordinates (0.5 arcsec) in sky pixel

column.name: [Y_SKY]
column.summary: Y sky coordinates (0.5 arcsec) in sky pixel

column.name: [CUT_RAD]
column.summary: [600] Source extraction radius in sky pixels

column.name: [TOTNUM]
column.summary: Total number of photons read from the PET and analyzed by the maximum likelihood algorithm

column.name: [BGR]
column.summary: Background in source extraction region in 1/pix_image

column.name: [REMARKS]
column.summary: [source nrby?] on flags originating from ML-detection

column.name: [B1]
column.summary: Background band A with other catalogue entries excised

column.name: [B2]
column.summary: Background band B with other catalogue entries excised

column.name: [B3]
column.summary: Background band C with other catalogue entries excised

column.name: [B4]
column.summary: Background band D with other catalogue entries excised

column.name: [B_SPA]
column.summary: Remaining bkg area in square arcmin

column.name: [S1]
column.summary: Source counts in band A (SB1 - B1*sbspa/bspa)

column.name: [S2]
column.summary: Source counts in band B (SB2 - B2*sbspa/bspa)

column.name: [S3]
column.summary: Source counts in band c (SB3 - B3*sbspa/bspa)

column.name: [S4]
column.summary: Source counts in band D (SB4 - B4*sbspa/bspa)

column.name: [mult_xmmsl1]
column.summary: Number of counterparts in the XMM Slew Survey within the distance of 60"

column.name: [entr_xmmsl1]
column.summary: Source number of nearest counterpart in the XMM Slew Survey

column.name: [SRCNAME_xmmsl1]
column.summary: Source name in the XMM Slew Survey

column.name: [mult_3xmm]
column.summary: Number of 3XMM counterparts within the distance of 60"

column.name: [entr_3xmm]
column.summary: Source number of nearest counterpart in the 3XMM Catalogue

column.name: [mult_2rxp]
column.summary: Number of 2RXP counterparts within the distance of 300"

column.name: [entr_2rxp]
column.summary: Source number of nearest counterpart in the 2RXP catalogue

column.name: [mult_1rxs]
column.summary: Number of 1RXS counterparts within a distance of 60"

column.name: [entr_1rxs]
column.summary: Source number of nearest counterpart in the 1RXS catalogue

column.name: [HR1_1rxs]
column.summary: 1RXS Hardness ratio 1 value. 1RXS hardness ratio 1 values have been calculated from the source counts in the energy A (11-41), B (52-201) by: HR_1=(B-A)/(B+A) in 1RXS Hardness ratio 2 values have been calculated from the source counts in the energy channels C (52-90), D(91-201) by: HR_2=(D-C)/(D+C) in the 1RXS

column.name: [HR2_1rxs]
column.summary: 1RXS Hardness ratio 2 value. 1RXS hardness ratio 1 values have been calculated from the source counts in the energy A (11-41), B (52-201) by: HR_1=(B-A)/(B+A) in 1RXS Hardness ratio 2 values have been calculated from the source counts in the energy channels C (52-90), D(91-201) by: HR_2=(D-C)/(D+C) in the 1RXS

column.name: [mult_vv10]
column.summary: Number of counterparts in the Veron and Verson Catalogue within the distance of 60"

column.name: [entr_vv10]
column.summary: Source number of VV10 nearest counterpart

column.name: [mult_tyc2]
column.summary: Number of the nearest counterpart in the Tycho2 Catalogue

column.name: [entr_tyc2]
column.summary: Source number of nearest Tyc2 counterpart

column.name: [TYC1_tyc2]
column.summary: Tyc2 TYC1 number. Tyhco 2 name (c.f. Note 1 of the Tycho-2 online catalogue description)

column.name: [TYC2_tyc2]
column.summary: Tyc2 TYC2 number. Tyhco 2 name (c.f. Note 1 of the Tycho-2 online catalogue description)

column.name: [TYC3_tyc2]
column.summary: Tyc2 TYC3 number. Tyhco 2 name (c.f. Note 1 of the Tycho-2 online catalogue description)

column.name: [mult_bri]
column.summary: Number of counterparts in the Catalogue of Bright Stars (BSC) within the distance of 300"

column.name: [entr_bri]
column.summary: Source number of nearest BSC counterpart

column.name: [mult_hmxb]
column.summary: Number of counterparts in the Catalog of High Mass X-Ray Binaries (HMXBCAT) within the distance of 60"

column.name: [entr_hmxb]
column.summary: Source number of nearest HMXBCAT counterpart

column.name: [mult_lmxb]
column.summary: Number of counterparts in the Catalog of Low Mass X-Ray Binaries (LMXBCAT) within the distance of 60"

column.name: [entr_lmxb]
column.summary: Source number of nearest LMXBCAT counterpart

column.name: [mult_atnf]
column.summary: Number of counterparts in the Pulsar Catalogue (ATNF) within the distance of 60"

column.name: [entr_atnf]
column.summary: Source number of nearest ATNF counterpart

column.name: [mult_fuh]
column.summary: Number of counterparts in the Catalog of Variable Sources from Fuhrmeister and Schmitt within the distance of 60"

column.name: [entr_fuh]
column.summary: Source number of nearest FUH counterpart

column.name: [mult_1sxps]
column.summary: Number of counterparts in Swift 1SXPS catalogue within a distance of 120"

column.name: [mult_1rxh]
column.summary: Number of counterparts in the 1RXH catalogue within the distance of 120"

column.name: [mult_flem]
column.summary: Number of counterparts in the Catalog of White Dwarfs from Flemming within the distance of 60"

column.name: [entr_flem]
column.summary: Source number of nearest Flemming counterpart

column.name: [SRCNAME_flem]
column.summary: Source name in the Flemming Catalogue

column.name: [e_Rate_flem]
column.summary: Error of the Flemming count rate

column.name: [mult_wd]
column.summary: Number of counterparts in the Catalog of White Dwarfs within the distance of 60 "

column.name: [entr_wd]
column.summary: Source number of nearest WD counterpart

column.name: [SRCNAME_wd]
column.summary: WD Source name in the Catalogue

column.name: [mult_sdss]
column.summary: Source number of the nearest counterpart in the Sloan Catalogue

column.name: [entr_sdss]
column.summary: Source number of SDSS nearest counterpart

column.name: [mult_2rxs]
column.summary: Number of counterparts in the 2RXS catalogue within the distance of 60"

column.name: [SEQ_ID_2rxs]
column.summary: Number of sky field of 2RXS nearest counterpart

column.name: [IND_DET_2rxs]
column.summary: Field detection number of 2RXS nearest counterpart

column.name: [RATE_2rxs]
column.summary: Source count rate of 2RXS nearest counterpart

column.name: [USKY_2rxs]
column.summary: [-1/9] Sub-field detection cell of 2RXS nearest counterpart

column.name: [X_BKG_1]
column.summary: X_sky coordinate of background center 1 in sky pixel

column.name: [Y_BKG_1]
column.summary: Y_sky coordinate of background center 1 in sky pixel

column.name: [X_BKG_2]
column.summary: X_sky coordinate of background center 2 in sky pixel

column.name: [Y_BKG_2]
column.summary: Y_sky coordinate of background center 2 in sky pixel

column.name: [BGR_1rxs]
column.summary: Background count rate per square arcmin from 1RXS

column.name: [BGR_2rxs]
column.summary: Background count rate per square arcmin from 2RXS

column.name: [LFLAG]
column.summary: Variability flag 0=good,1=bkg. quality flag for background selection for lightcurves and spectra: 0=good, bit 1: of CM+CD<0, bit 2: background in masked region

column.name: [CM6]
column.summary: Count rate for light curve with less than 6s exposure

column.name: [CD6]
column.summary: Standard deviation of light curves with less than 6s exposure

column.name: [EXCESSVAR6]
column.summary: Excess variance for light curves with less than 6s exposure

column.name: [NBINS_A]
column.summary: Number of data points in the LC

column.name: [NBINS_6]
column.summary: Number of data points with exposures times less than 6s

column.name: [NBINS_1]
column.summary: Number of data points with exposures times less than 1s

column.name: [NBINS_N]
column.summary: Number of data points with exposure times greater than 6s

column.name: [CMIN6]
column.summary: Minimum count rate for light curves with exposure times of less than 6s

column.name: [CMAX6]
column.summary: Maximum count rate for light curves with exposure times of less than 6s

column.name: [CTS_lc6]
column.summary: [-] Number of counts for light curves with exposure times of less than 6s (CTS_lc6) Not used

column.name: [SIGMA_excess6]
column.summary: Excess variance for light curves with exposure times of less than 6s

column.name: [CM_plus_CD]
column.summary: Sum of count rate + standard deviation

column.name: [SPX]
column.summary: [0/1] graphical illustrations from spectral fits available in spx subdirectory

column.name: [LCX]
column.summary: [0/1] light curve exists as graphical illustration in clx subdirectory

column.name: [OBS_CLOCK_1]
column.summary: Start time of exposure when source is within FOV and detector ons

column.name: [OBS_CLOCK_2]
column.summary: End time of exposure when source is within FOV and detector ons

column.name: [OBS_DATE_1]
column.summary: Start time of exposure when source is within FOV and detector on

column.name: [OBS_DATE_2]
column.summary: End time of exposure when source is within FOV and detector on
